user_query: I'm planning a basketball-themed party and I want to gather some NBA player information. Can you provide me with the players' details by their IDs? Additionally, fetch the racecards for today's greyhound races. Lastly, recommend some surebets to make some profitable bets.

TaskList.description: Gather information about NBA players using their IDs.
Fetch the racecards for today's greyhound races.
Recommend surebets for profitable betting based on the greyhound races.
